data.name: AccountSetupMessage1
data.value: Wait a few minutes and then click the Sign In button to try again. When your account is ready, you'll be able to sign in and start using Sage 300.

data.name: AccountSetupMessage2
data.value: While we set up your account, you can visit the help center and review information about getting started with Sage 300.

data.name: AccountSetupTitle
data.value: Please wait while we set up your account

data.name: ContactSupportLink
data.value: Contact customer support

data.name: NeedAssistance
data.value: Need assistance?

data.name: SessionDateinInactiveYear
data.value: Your session date is within the range of an inactive fiscal year in your defined fiscal calendar. You may need to select a different session date to avoid errors when processing transactions.

data.name: SessionDateinInactiveYear_Title
data.value: Session Date in Inactive Fiscal Year

data.name: SessionDateinLockedPeriod
data.value: Your session date is within the range of a locked fiscal period in your defined fiscal calendar. You may need to select a different session date to avoid errors when processing transactions.

data.name: SessionDateinLockedPeriod_Title
data.value: Session Date in Locked Fiscal Period

data.name: SessionDateLocked
data.value: Session Period is locked

data.name: SessionDateNotActive
data.value: Session Year is not active

data.name: SessionDateNotInCalendar
data.value: Your session date is outside the range of the company’s defined fiscal calendar. You may need to select a different session date to avoid errors when processing transactions.

data.name: SessionDateNotInCalendar_Title
data.value: Session Date Not In Fiscal Calendar

data.name: SignIn
data.value: Sign In

data.name: TenantNotAvailableMessage
data.value: The account you are trying to access is not available. It may be inactive, suspended, or experiencing a temporary issue.

data.name: TenantNotAvailableTitle
data.value: Account not available

data.name: VisitHelpCenter
data.value: Visit the Help Center

data.name: MissingModules_Description
data.value: General Ledger is required for Sage 300 web screens, but has not been activated for this company. To continue, take one of the following steps:

data.name: MissingModules_Header
data.value: General Ledger Required

data.name: MissingModules_SignIn
data.value: Sign in again

data.name: MissingModules_Step1
data.value: Use desktop screens to manage information and transactions for this company

data.name: MissingModules_Step2
data.value: Sign in to another company for which General Ledger has been activated

data.name: MissingModules_Step3
data.value: Have your administrator activate General Ledger for this company

data.name: ICTNotAvailable_Description
data.value: Sage 300 web screens are not available for Intercompany Transactions (ICT) companies. Sign in to a non-ICT company to use web screens.

data.name: ICTNotAvailable_Header
data.value: Intercompany Transactions Company Not Available

data.name: IncorrectAcctOrPwd
data.value: The User ID or Password is incorrect. Try again.

data.name: NoAuthorizedCompany
data.value: You are not authorized to open any company. Contact your system administrator for help.
